title: Authors and Citation
text: Mikkel Hovden Christensen. Author, maintainer. Simon Opstrup Drue. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Christensen MH, Drue (2022). dreams: Deep Read-level Error Model Sequencing data. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/JakobSkouPedersenLab/dreams.
code: @Manual{,   title = {dreams: Deep Read-level Error Model for Sequencing data},   author = {Mikkel Hovden Christensen and Simon Opstrup Drue},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/JakobSkouPedersenLab/dreams}, }

what: Deep Read-level Error Model for Sequencing data
title: Deep Read-level Error Model for Sequencing data
text: goal DREAMS develop accurate error models Next-generation sequencing data. error model can used variant calling using DREAMS-vc method calling cancer using DREAMS-cc method.

title: Deep Read-level Error Model for Sequencing data
text: can install development version dreams GitHub :

title: Deep Read-level Error Model for Sequencing data
code: library(dreams)  # For training data DREAMS requires one or more bam-files # and a reference genome  training_data = get_training_data(   bam_paths = "/path/bam_file",   reference_path = "/path/hg38.fa",   ...)  # The model can be trained using a neural network # - and requires basic settings for keras  model = train_model(   training_data,   layers = c(16,8),   model_features = c("trinucleotide_ctx", "strand", "read_index"),   lr = 0.01,   batch_size = 10000,   epochs = 100,   ...)    # Call variants using DREAM-vc  variant_calls = variant_caller(   bam_path = "/path/test_bam_file",   positions = "positions_file",   model )  # Call cancer using DREAM-cc  cancer_calls = cancer_caller(   bam_path = "/path/test_bam_file",   positions = "positions_file",   model )

Default NULL. positions_to_exclude_paths Vector strings. List files positions exclude training length equal number samples. Default NULL. mm_rate_max Number 0 1. Maximum mismatch rate position. Default 1. verbose TODO: Write

title: Train error model — train_model
text: Train error model

title: Train error model — train_model
code: train_model(   training_data,   layers,   model_features,   lr,   batch_size,   epochs,   model_file_path = NULL,   log_file_path = NULL,   decay = 0,   min_delta = 0,   patience = 0,   l2_reg = 0,   validation_split = 0,   ctx3_embed_dim = 3 )

title: Train error model — train_model
text: training_data data.frame Input training data (Generated get_training_data()) layers Numeric vector. Number nodes layer. model_features Vector feature names. Selected features model training. lr Numeric value 0 1. Learning rate. batch_size Integer. Batch size. epochs Integer. Number training epochs. model_file_path String. Model output file path. Default NULL. log_file_path String. Path model output log file. Default NULL. decay Numeric value 0 1. Decay rate. Default 0. min_delta Numeric value 0 1. Minimum delta early stopping. Default 0. patience Integer. Patience reaching minimum delta. Default 0. l2_reg Numeric value 0 1. Level L2 regularization per layer. Default 0. validation_split Numeric value 0 1. Validation split ratio. Default 0. ctx3_embed_dim Integer. Number dimensions embed trinucleotide context . Default 3.
